item.description:
TICKETS ONLINE

For a decade, an elite team of intelligence and military operatives, working in secret across the globe, devoted themselves to a single goal: to find and eliminate Osama bin Laden. Zero Dark Thirty reunites the Oscar winning team of director-producer Kathryn Bigelow and writer-producer Mark Boal (The Hurt Locker) for the story of history's greatest manhunt for the world's most dangerous man.

Zero Dark Thirty Official Site - Online Ticket site when available

"Zero Dark Thirty is in fact a thrilling work of journalism come to life...This is a film about a fierce woman's pursuit to solve a problem and the people involved in the procedural tactics of getting that work done. It just happens to be that this work is based on the story of the world's greatest manhunt." - Aaron Neuwirth

 

As much as I'd prefer to support independent Cinema, and introduce some to the home of the best Independent Film Festival in Boston, in May, I must switch the location of this showing to the AMC Boston Common, 4:05 pm.  We can purchase tickets online, which will enable us to have tickets in hand instead of worrying about going out to Davis Square an hour before the film to avoid a sell-out.  Second, I am unable to secure confirmed reservations at a restaurant in Davis Square.  Managers have to 'call to confirm' a large party reservation, and my phone has been silent.  By viewing at Boston Common, we can go to Pho Pasteur, or another place with seating to have our discussion.

See you at the movie,

John
item.how_to_find_us: John will gather the group AFTER close of credits in the lobby area holding an authentic, antique, Meetup Sign, so that we can use the restroom and go to a nearby eatery
item.name: Zero Dark Thirty
